metadata.title: Tree-Free Greetings lm43590 Fantasy Dragon Shadow with Fairy Ceramic Mug with Full Sized Handle by Amy Brown, 15-Ounce
features: Hard to find Fantasy Dragon Shadow With Fairy art by Amy Brown
description: Tree-Free Greetings strives to use the most eco friendly materials and processes possible. Printed and assembled in the USA, The Tree-Free Greetings 15 Ounce Ceramic Mug With Full-Sized Handle is vibrantly printed with hard to find Dragon and Faery themed art by Amy Brown and is great for everyday use. It is reusable therefore eliminating any disposable paper or Styrofoam cup waste. BPA free and Proposition 65 compliant, this beautiful and durable ceramic mug has a generous full sized handle, comes with a protective gift box and holds 15 ounces of your favorite hot beverage; hand washing is recommended. The 15 Ounce Ceramic Mug With Full-Sized Handle makes the perfect gift or souvenir for everyday use. Save trees, spread joy, buy a Tree-Free earth-friendly gift today.
